results.title: Verification emails from gate.io are no longer being received - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I went through your post carefully and learned that Gate.io is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that offers various services, such as spot trading, futures trading, margin trading, and lending. One of the features of Gate.io is its email service provider, which is Mailgun. Mailgun is a cloud-based email delivery service that allows users to.

results.title: How to allow verification code from gmail to outlook inbox when trying to forward emails from google? - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I am trying to forward my Gmail emails to Outlook. I am unable to forward my emails because I am unable to obtain a verification code in Outlook.| | Dear Suzanne Lemery , Thank you for reaching out to the Microsoft Q&A Community. Outlook may block these message... Recommended workaround: Use a relay service like Mailgun or SendGrid to rewrite.

results.title: Mailgun.org email automation - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: This week Outlook.com blocked an important email from a... I usually receive their emails but on this occasion they used an email automation service, mailgun.org. Does anyone know of a work around other than just switching over to gmail for all important business?| Hi MarieRoseAmanda, As an end-user you can't do much, mailgun.org needs to work.
